## select variable

An RxJS pipe that returns a part of the state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
select: <T, S>(selector: (state: S) => T, isEqual?: (s1: T, s2: T) => boolean) => import("rxjs").UnaryFunction<import("rxjs").Observable<S>, import("rxjs").Observable<[T, T]>>
```
